map.name: Build: Duel Arena
map.objective: Build a defensive base then fight the other team!

broadcasts.alert: Build a defensive base on your side of the arena!
Make sure your structure reaches the central island...
You'll need to make your way to this island later!
broadcasts.tip: You can return to the starting point to restock on materials!
broadcasts.alert: Reach the central island or risk pentaly during the duel!
Red team failed to reach the central island and a pre-build structure will be generated instead.
Blue team failed to reach the central island and a pre-build structure will be generated instead.
Team sides are being switched for this duel!
The DEFAULT kit has been chosen for this duel!
The ARCHER kit has been chosen for this duel!
The UHC kit has been chosen for this duel!
The GOLD kit has been chosen for this duel!
The BOMBER kit has been chosen for this duel!
The DIAMOND kit has been chosen for this duel!
The SLAPPY FISH kit has been chosen for this duel!

The UHC kit has been randomly selected for this duel!
The GOLD kit has been randomly selected for this duel!
The BOMBER kit has been randomly selected for this duel!
The DIAMOND kit has been randomly selected for this duel!
The SLAPPY FISH kit has been randomly selected for this duel!
Eliminate the other team or capture the central point to win the game!
